About Reign of Iron

Join the Clan

About Us

Reign of Iron is a clan playing Destiny 2 on PC. We primarily focus on PvP gameplay, but also spend a fair amount of time on PvE endgame content, like raids and prestige Nightfalls.

Why Reign of Iron?

Reign of Iron is a mid-sized clan with a healthy active roster full of people who still enjoy this game. Our goal is to make friends and help others enjoy this game too. Our main focus is PvP and ultimately consistent success in Trials, as well as building a Prestige Raid team.

Our members are strong players, but we're not gods. That means that you don't have to be a god to join (but if you are, awesome), but we are not a carry clan.

No K/D requirements. No required hours of operation. Our only requirement is that you have Discord and use it. Just know what you're doing out there, be willing to make callouts and play as a team, and strive to improve every week. That's what we're doing too.

Apply to Join!

FAQ

How long has this clan been around?

Reign of Iron was founded in Destiny 2 Season 2, December 2017.

Where is the clan located?

Reign of Iron is a primarily North American clan. We're not opposed to EU members, but you might have a harder time scheduling with other members.

Any clan rules?

We don't police what our members do or say, and we'd like to keep it that way. So don't be a jerk to other members, and we won't need to make a bunch of rules to keep people in line.

We have members of all ages, backgrounds, and skill levels.

How do I get in?

Just apply! Membership applications are evaluated on a case-by-case basis.

Apply Now

I'm in the clan, but I can't get a Discord invite. Help!

Sorry about that! If you need a Discord invite, please contact CanisMajoris#9457 or Kuro#9556 directly on Discord and we'll get you added in.

What are the clan ranks?

Currently, there are five ranks in Reign of Iron: Iron Initiate, Iron Sentry, Honored Brigadier, Exalted Brigadier, and Iron Lord.

Iron Initiate

Iron Initiate is a trial-level rank that applies for the first week of membership, restricting some of your permissions in Discord. Barring anything out of the ordinary, Iron Initiates become Iron Sentries after one week.

Iron Sentry

Iron Sentry is the entry level clan rank. Sentries are active members who are here to hang out, have fun, and make friends while working on getting better, eventually becoming an Honored Brigadier.

Honored Brigadier

Honored Brigadiers are guardians a cut above. This is a stat based rank, with standards drawn by averaging the statistics of the Iron Lords. Honored Brigadiers have a PvP KDA of 1.50 or better, or at PvE KD of 20.0 or better.

Exalted Brigadier

Exalted Brigadiers are the elite of Reign of Iron, whose time dedicated to the game shows in their accomplishments. These guardians are our Trials of the Nine veterans and raid sherpas. Exalted Brigadiers have a PvP KDA of 1.50 or better, or a PvE Raid/Strike average KD of 20.0 or better.

Iron Lord

Iron Lords are members who have played a special role in founding and forming Reign of Iron. The Iron Lords have stuck with the game and the clan through the best and worst of Destiny 2, all while fostering community, recruiting, and actively working to improve membership experience for everyone.

Who built this website?

Kuro.
